Name: Quincy Jones
Ingredients: 10 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Miran Chauhan at Bon Vivant, Edinburgh, Scotland.
Nutrition: One serving of Quincy Jones contains 137 calories
